description: Stuffed with juicy tomatoes, crispy greens, and slathered in creamy dairy-free pimento cheese, these vegan fried green tomato sandwiches make a perfect summer lunch or light dinner!
name: Fried Green Tomato Sandwiches with Pimento Cashew Cheese
recipeIngredient: 1 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4-8 hours and drained)
2 tablespoons vinegar based hot sauce (like Cholula)
1 tablespoon non-dairy milk, (or more, as needed)
8 slices good sandwich bread (sourdough works great!)
1 large or 2 small red ripe tomatoes, (sliced)
Green leaf lettuce, (or greens of choice)

recipeInstructions.text: To make the cashew pimento cheese, place all of the ingredients into the bowl of a food processor fitted with an s-blade.
Blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl as needed, and adding additional milk if needed.
Slather the bread slices with the pimento cheese, then double up the slices and stuff them with fried green tomatoes, ripe tomatoes, and lettuce.
